title: Drawing, "Part of a sheet of a drawing book: figures and architectural plans", late 18th century
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, bistre, on paper
markings: Recto and Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: A group of two women sitting and a man standing are engaged in conversation. He is attired in according to seventeenth century Dutch fashion. Another man, seated at right, is clothed like a Dutch peasant. At left, is a bird's eye view of a structure in wheel form; a sketch of a part of its plan is above the figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Part of a sheet of a drawing book: figures and architectural plans", late 18th century.
late 18th century. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, bistre, on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2055.
